gurmukhi: ਰੁਣ ਝੁਣ ਬਾਜੇ ॥ ਜਣ ਘਣ ਗਾਜੇ ॥
transliteration: Roun Jhoun Baaje|| Jan Ghan Gadje||
translation: Such a sound is being heard in the battlefield as if the clouds are thundering.
The resounding of the drums and the sound of the empty quivers is also being hard.13.

gurmukhi: ਥਰ ਹਰ ਕੰਪੈ ॥ ਹਰਿ ਹਰਿ ਜੰਪੈ ॥
transliteration: Thar Har Kanpai|| Har(i) Har(i) Janpai||
translation: The warriors are battled and seeing the dreadful war, they are mediating upon the Lord-God.

gurmukhi: ਰਣ ਰੰਗ ਰੱਤੇ ॥ ਜਣ ਗਣ ਮਤੇ ॥੧੪॥
transliteration: Ran Ran Ratte|| Jan Gad Mate||14||
translation: All are absorbed in the war and are submerged in the thoughts of war.14.
The brave fighters are moving hither and thither and the heavenly damsels are looking at them.
The heroes have abandoned everything and having been chopped several warriors have played with their lives.15.
The arrows are glittering and the flags are flying;

gurmukhi: ਚਟ ਪਟ ਜੂਟੇ ॥ ਅਰ ੳੁਰ ਫੂਟੇ ॥੧੬॥
transliteration: Chat Pat Jeete|| Ar Ur Phoote||16||
translation: The warriors are fighting face to face very quickly and the blood is oozing out of their chests.16.

gurmukhi: ਨਰ ਬਰ ਗੱਜੇ ॥ ਸਰ ਬਰ ਸੱਜੇ ॥
transliteration: Nar Bar Gadje|| Sar Bar Sajje||
translation: Bedecked with the arrows, the brave warriors are roaring;
They are ornamented with steel armours and are moving towards heaven.17.
When the superior arrows are discharged, the chests of the enemies are wounded.

gurmukhi: ਚਟ ਪਟ ਚਰਮੰ ॥ ਫਟ ਫੁਟ ਬਰਮੰ ॥੧੮॥
transliteration: Chat Pat Charman|| Phat Phout Baramannd||18||
translation: The shields being cut are producing knocking sound and the armours are being torn.18.

gurmukhi: ਦਿਨੇਸ ਬਾਣ ਪਾਣ ਲੈ ਰਿਪੇਸ ਤਾਕ ਧਾੲੀਯੰ ॥ ਅਨੰਤ ਜੁੱਧ ਕ੍ਰੁੱਧ ਸੁੱਧੁ ਭੂਮ ਮੈ ਮਚਾੲੀਯੰ ॥
transliteration: Dines Baan Paan Lai Ripes Taak Dhaaeeyan|| Anant Juddh Kruddh Suddh(u) Bhoom Mai Machaaeeyan||
translation: Taking his arrow in his hand, Suraj ran towards the enemy Deeraghkaya and in great ire began a dreadful war.
